fxInfo_clarification: If constitution expressly prohibits any actor from dissolving or adjourning the legislature, please answer ”Other, please specify in the comments section”. Choose all that apply.
fxInfo_question: Who, if anybody, can dismiss the legislature?

fxInfo_responses.value: Head of State (use this choice for single executive systems)
Either Head of State or Head of Government
Other, please specify in the comments section

fxInfo_sources: CCP (Elkins et al. 2014), v255; IAEP, questions 4. 1; but only either or.
name: e_ccp_legdiss
